description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'indicators' | Evaluation of data availability on population health indicators at the regional level across the European Union | Welcome to the eurohealthydata portal! | This portal aggregates the data collected within the scope of the Project EURO-HEALTHY – Shaping EUROpean policies to promote HEALTH equitY, coordinated by the Centre of Studies for Geography and Spatial Planning (CEGOT) at the University of Coimbra and funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement number 643398. Access to this portal is protected and subject to authorization
name: EURO-HEALTHY
